description:
A man uses his fortune-telling skills to win a reward.  A suspicious man believes rumors that lead to his fiancee`s death. An old priest tricks a monster.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hakke Hachitarou / Ohatsu Kannon / Akaike no Bakemono
Hakke Hachitarou / Ohatsu Kannon / The Monster of Red Lake
はっけ八太郎 / お初観音 / 赤池の化物
